entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
